result.name: Schizosaccharomyces pombe genetic diversity
result.description:
S.pombe is the "other yeast" genetic model system.  All 107 known wild isolates have been collected  around the world.  14 have already been sequenced.  The aim of the study is to sequence 96 samples (three overlapping with the previously sequenced 14) to generate a genetic diversity resource for S.pombe comparable to that available for  S.cerevisiae. 
This data is part of a pre-publication release. For information on the proper use of pre-publication data shared by the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute (including details of any publication moratoria), please see http://www.sanger.ac.uk/datasharing/
